The Quranic researcher was a relationship, that is, with the power of God, as he said, then he said, then we created the sperm with a relationship [the believers: 14] So he created, and God Almighty has made it.Created, just amended and completely, so he made any of the human being and was said from the semen of the Zawajin, that is, the two classists, the male and the female, with the extent of the Zoom and the two who are not.Zaid ibn Ali al -Zujan read the thousands on the language of the children of al -Harith ibn Kaab and whoever agreed with the Arabs from the universe of the one in all the cases.
